name: sinus
content:
sinus noun
(SPACE IN BODY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] any of the spaces inside the head that are connected to the back of the nose
[ C ]
  medical
  specialized a space or passage filled with pus (= a thick yellow liquid) that flows to the surface of the skin

sinus noun
(HEART)
[ U ]
  medical
  specialized the sinoatrial node (= tissue in the heart responsible for the heart's rhythm): The electrocardiogram will confirm sinus bradycardia.
